name: Lagavulin
description: Known for its intensely smoky and peaty single malt whiskies, Lagavulin is one of Islay's most famous distilleries.

name: Ardbeg
description: Produces some of the peatiest, smokiest, most complex single malt whiskies in the world.

name: Balvenie
description: Traditional Speyside distillery known for its handcrafted approach and honey-influenced whiskies.

name: Highland Park
description: The most northerly Scottish distillery, producing balanced single malts with subtle smoke.

name: Talisker
description: The only single malt Scotch whisky from the Isle of Skye, known for its maritime character.
